basic_information.scholarship_name: Marissa Murrow 'Live with Heart' Legacy Scholarship

description: To provide a scholarship for a current UCO student who is an active member of the Sigma Kappa Sorority. Eligibility Requirements Must be an active member of Sigma Kappa Minimum GPA of 3.0 A short statement highlighting personal growth after becoming a member of the Sigma Kappa Sorority Demonstrate financial need Letter of recommendation from a member of the executive board

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
